item.description:
ICC members are meeting to start a success virus. Our June 23 meeting on Tips has been retooled as a discussion led by Kay Green, of Green Graphic Design, Chris Amorosino, of Amorosino Writing, and Laura Kolk, of Kolk Design. Come for a night of inspiration and motivation. This is a night to lift your spirits and your energy.

- Bring stories about a great photo shoot or a promotion campaign
- Share a design you are really proud of or a client you helped
- Share how you redid your invoicing system to save time or found a great web site for free stuff
- Give us insight on how you remain positive
- Let us know how you get yourself unstuck when your mind is a blank
- What books or magazines are inspiring you?
- How did you win that precious new client?
- Tell us the highlight of work year to date
- Gush about your favorite low cal desert
- Sing praises for your favorite web site
- Share how you reduce stress

Donâ€™t have anything to share? Come, have a glass of wine and get inspired.
Hope to see you there.

TO RESERVE YOUR PLACE:
- Go to: www.paypal.com and select the "Send Money" tab
- Insert "kolkdesign@usa.net" in "Recipient's Email".
- Type in the amount you wish to send. ($24 per person)
- Select "Service" for "Type" (of money sent).
- Put ICC meeting-June 23 in the "Subject" box.
- Note: Use the PayPal message box to type in your meal preference. This time our meal choices are: Basa Sole; Chicken Marsala with Mushrooms; or Penne Roberto (vegetarian).

OUR RESERVATION DEADLINE is Thursday, June 18th.
To cancel your reservation, you must do so by 5pm June 18th or your payment will be forfeited.


For questions, please contact Kay Green: kay.green@sbcglobal.net

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: New Format: Tips & Such ICC June Meeting
